author: ryanleeschneider
content: Is there an EIP that specifies what `block.timestamp` should contain at the EL block headers after the merge?  I'd always assumed it was defined in -3675 but I'm not seeing it there.  Is the only requirement still `(54)` from the yellow paper? (basically that `block.timestamp > parent.timestamp` or is it supposed to line up w/ the slot time in some way?

author: ajsutton
content: The consensus spec requires the timestamp to be the slot start time.  The EL still just checks that it's > parent.timestamp I believe.
